name: Secret Health Heist
description:
Made as an entry in the 2022 Mega Health Jam competition, this roomscale VR experience was designed around using the Teslasuit. Make sure a 18x8 space is accessible for use if downloading for use. 

Austin Pinzon - Director, Programmer
Angel Rodriguez - Programmer
Ethan Constant - Programmer, Level Designer
Colby Breitenbach - Tech Artist, Animator
Trey Atwood - Producer, 3D Artist
Michael Fiorello - 3D Artist 
Jonathan Montague - 3D Artist
Noah Baggs - Guest 3D Artist
